name: Sulfate transport via ABC system
reaction: atp_c + h2o_c + so4_e --> adp_c + h_c + pi_c + so4_c

name: Bifurcating Hydrogenase
reaction: 2.0 fdxr_42_c + 3.0 h_c + nadh_c <=> 2.0 fdxo_42_c + 2.0 h2_c + nad_c

name: L phenylalanine reversible transport via proton symport
N-acetyl-g-glutamyl-phosphate reductase
reaction: acg5sa_c + nadp_c + pi_c <=> acg5p_c + h_c + nadph_c

name: CTP synthase  NH3
reaction: atp_c + nh4_c + utp_c --> adp_c + ctp_c + 2.0 h_c + pi_c

name: Iron (III) transport via ABC system
reaction: atp_c + fe3_e + h2o_c --> adp_c + fe3_c + h_c + pi_c

name: Nicotinate-mononucleotide adenylyltransferase
reaction: atp_c + dnad_c + gln__L_c + h2o_c --> amp_c + glu__L_c + 2.0 h_c + nad_c + ppi_c

name: Quinolinate synthase
reaction: dhap_c + iasp_c --> 2.0 h2o_c + h_c + pi_c + quln_c

name: Argininosuccinate synthase
reaction: asp__L_c + atp_c + citr__L_c <=> amp_c + argsuc_c + 2.0 h_c + ppi_c

name: Glutamine phosphoribosyldiphosphate amidotransferase
reaction: gln__L_c + h2o_c + prpp_c --> glu__L_c + h_c + ppi_c + pram_c

name: Pyruvate,phosphate dikinase.
reaction: amp_c + 2.0 h_c + pep_c + ppi_c --> atp_c + pi_c + pyr_c

name: GMP synthase
reaction: atp_c + nh4_c + xmp_c --> amp_c + gmp_c + 3.0 h_c + ppi_c

name: Nicotinate-nucleotide diphosphorylase (carboxylating)
reaction: h_c + prpp_c + quln_c --> co2_c + nicrnt_c + ppi_c

name: C. therm biomass objective function for cellobiose grown cultures  (2% DCW corresponds to cellulase)
IMP dehydrogenase
reaction: h2o_c + imp_c + nad_c <=> h_c + nadh_c + xmp_c

name: Magnesium transport via ABC system
reaction: atp_c + h2o_c + mg2_e --> adp_c + h_c + mg2_c + pi_c

name: Anthranilate synthase
reaction: chor_c + gln__L_c --> anth_c + glu__L_c + h_c + pyr_c

name: hydrogen-sulfide:NADP+ oxidoreductase
reaction: 3.0 h_c + 3.0 nadph_c + so3_c --> 3.0 h2o_c + h2s_c + 3.0 nadp_c

name: Glutamate dehydrogenase (NADP)
reaction: glu__L_c + h2o_c + nadp_c <=> akg_c + h_c + nadph_c + nh4_c

name: Alanyl-lipoteichoic acid synthesis
reaction: 24.0 ala__D_c + 24.0 atp_c + 24.0 cdpglyc_c + dg12dg_c + 24.0 h2o_c --> ala_lta_c + 24.0 amp_c + 24.0 cmp_c + 48.0 h_c + 24.0 ppi_c

name: Acetaldehyde dehydrogenase (acetylating)
reaction: accoa_c + h_c + nadh_c --> acald_c + coa_c + nad_c

name: Ferredoxin : nadp reductase (NFN)
reaction: 2.0 fdxr_42_c + h_c + nadh_c + 2.0 nadp_c <=> 2.0 fdxo_42_c + nad_c + 2.0 nadph_c

name: 3-methyl-2-oxobutanoate dehydrogenase (ferredoxin)
reaction: 3mob_c + coa_c + 2.0 fdxo_42_c --> co2_c + 2.0 fdxr_42_c + h_c + ibcoa_c
